Comments.Message: Note that swapping out Shard of Woe from the current set (which incidentally is NOT marked towards optimization), circumvents the issue. So, I would assume the issue has to do with the prompt that tells you one of your currently-equipped items is not available for the optimization run.
I get this error too, when i try to optimize gear after changing my boots to new ones. Indeed it seems like the issue is connected with prompt about not marked item being equipped.

I can confirm that trying to optimize while an item you are wearing is not marked for optimization will cause the optimizer to send an error report and not run. At least, that's what happened to me, and marking said item for optimization seemed to solve the issue.
